title: Rads error.
body: I've recently had this problem and have found a solution. I don't know if it will help everyone but i hope it will help at least some. So i went here Control Panel\All Control Panel Items\Windows Firewall\Allowed apps then i allowed LoL Patcher through firewall after doing this i restarted my computer and then the problem was fixed.

replies.body: Same thing has happened, I've followed all the old steps that used to remove the error, and they haven't fixed it for me. Restarting after allowing it through the firewall didn't work either.
